name: Dreamchaser
description:
Haunted by a surreal demon through randomly generated hallways, you must clear your head and work your way to a powerful set of dreamcatchers!

Made for Mini jam 105: Dreamy. Hope you enjoy!

No music or sound, as I didn't manage to get around to it... Just one of the problems with working alone I suppose :P

I think it's good fun, and I hope you agree. I had a lot of fun making it!
